entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
